name: The Ascendant (SergioCMDev)
description:
The game tells the story of how a once powerful evil has become even worse in the present and how our protagonist's family tried throughout the ages to put an end to it. As the game progresses you will return to a previous life where the evil is not so powerful and so on and so forth until you get to the root of the problem.

 Controls:
 Move --> WASD and Arrow Keys 
Jump --> Space 
Attack --> Left Click
